description:
RealSimpleEDU.com brings you on-the-go learning and reference for Sales

App offers quizzes, tutorials and flashcards to help you learn Principles of Sales

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App Tools include search .

Includes following tutorials:


Introduction,
Principles of Sales,
Planning the Sale,
Personal Selling I,
Personal Selling II,
Process of Sales,
Prospecting and Qualifying,
PreApproach,
Approach,
Positive Communication for Selling,
Making the Sales Presentation,
Objection Handling,
Closing the Sale,
Formal Negotiation,
Post Sale Activities,
Building Future Sale,
Increasing Selling Efficiency.



Includes following Quizzes:
Quiz from Introduction to Personal Selling,
Quiz from Process of Sales to Approach,
Quiz from Positive Communication for Selling to Closing the Sale,
Quiz from Formal Negotiation to Increasing Selling Efficiency.

Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and most complete.


Our Mission: A RealSimpleEDU app in every pocket.


Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
